Package pivot_contrib.guretzki

This package has two functions: It's the root of all source of the guretzki part of the Apache Extras pivot-contrib project and it contains all classes that can sensibly be used from within .bxml files.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BlockingDialog Can host any Dialog outside of the normal Application HostFrame; this way, awt is used to do the BlockingDialog.open(Display) in a blocking way, i. e. the flow of control doesn't return before the content Dialog is closed.
 

Package pivot_contrib.guretzki Description

This package has two functions:

  • It's the root of all source of the guretzki part of the Apache Extras pivot-contrib project and
  • it contains all classes that can sensibly be used from within .bxml files.
